metadata.title: Journal of Infection The index case of SARS-CoV-2 in Scotland: a case report

abstract.original_text: Since its identification in December 2019, SARS-CoV-2 has infected 125,048 persons globally with cases identified in 118 countries across all continents (1). We report on the Scottish index case of SARS-CoV-2 infection, the virus causing COVID-19.

sentences.segment_text: SARS-CoV-2 has infected 125,048 persons globally with cases identified in 118 countries across all continents ( 1 ) .
We report on the Scottish index case of SARS-CoV-2 infection , the virus causing COVID-19 .
